messages.message: We have a tooltip on the change indicator in design which is missing. Can we please add it? @Serena @Bastiane cc @Natasha
I already have a ticket for this here (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FLOW-7211?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiZmZhNTViNGY1OGM5NDdmYWFkMzMzNGM3NmFmZTkxMmEiLCJwIjoiaiJ9) @Serena!

I do think this requires a pollen change though — the reason I didn’t add this earlier was:
1. the status dots are incredibly short lived 
2. The `BetaTooltip` component doesn’t work on `Icon` component cc @Liam Callanan
It does seem like with the ticket Serena linked issue 1 will be addressed
It does, but you may be overriding `Icon` in a custom theme & not forwarding ref
ah nice, I suspect it’s actually a focus issue w/ tableList (like you and I discussed yesterday :smile: )
